title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Senior Labor frontbencher Joel Fitzgibbon says drought-stricken parts of Australia could face a "war-like" situation if it doesn't rain in coming months. The Opposition is calling for a World War Two-style emergency cabinet to deal with the ongoing crisis, but the government argues the idea is out of step with modern times. Prime Minister Scott Morrison will fly in to Canberra on Monday for another sitting week, during which the drought and trade deals are set to dominate the agenda. Image: News Corp Australia
